item.title: How I stream content
item.description: Background A friend told me about a new way to stream media content for roughly $3-5 per month, depending on the subscription you choose. I immediately tested, and became amazed how good it was. There are a few technical steps involved, but if you’re reading this then, you can probably reach out to me with any queries. There a few ways to set this up. This guide will take the simplest approach, using three different services:
